description:
Luffy stands his ground and waits for his friend to return! But the vengeful army washes over him - only a true friend can step in to turn the tide of battle! Meanwhile, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage - and come to a startling conclusion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bouken no Owari: Sanji Ketsui no Propose
Das Ende des Abenteuers! – Sanji entschlossener Heiratsantrag!
La fin de l`aventure. La proposition résolue de Sanji
The End of the Adventure! Sanji`s Resolute Proposal!
冒険の終わり サンジ決意のプロポーズ
